name: Alien Puzzle Trap
description:
This is Alien puzzle trap, a game about trapping aliens that keep coming up out thin air.
The idea is that you make holes in the ground in the shape that would trap the alien, once it's trapped our blasters will send the monster flying to another dimension.
The mechanic is basically just shape matching, nothing fancy, but the camera is rotating so it's a little bit harder.

Explosion: VFX Grenade Pack by https://gentlemanfredfx.tumblr.com/
VFX Variety pack by kakky https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/a36bac8b05004e999dd4b1d33...
Sound effect by Kenney https://kenney.nl
Background music by AIVA.COM
Explosion sound by https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MdO3_r6juRU
